document.full_text: the u.s. recovery is gaining traction, two top federal reserve officials said on tuesday, though they differed on the risks of inflation in the u.s. economy.
document.title: fed officials see u.s. recovery taking hold
lines_and_colors: the u.s. recovery is gaining traction, two top federal reserve officials said on tuesday, though they differed on the risks of inflation in the u.s. economy.
